content.name: Running
content.description: I regularly run around 5km most days and like to explore hiking trails on the weekends.

content.name: Creative Writing
content.description: I write Sci-Fi and Fantasy. Sometimes poetically. Most times, slowly and haltingly. I enjoy it almost half as much as the world-building that goes along with it.

content.name: Experimental Cooking
content.description: I almost always modify recipes and sometimes come up with my own with the goal of better nutrient profiles to meet my protein, fibre and micronutrient needs with a low glycemic load and a shoe-string budget. From the latest iteration of my regular handmade bread to protein bars without protein powder.

content.name: Coding Projects
content.description: I have a steady habit of following my interests into projects and making little scripts to make my life easier. From games and mobile apps, to pharmacological simulations and automated advice.

content.name: Reading
content.description: I read fantasy and sci-fi, and occasionally history and philosophy.

content.name: Diving Down Rabbit Holes
content.description: I like deep diving topics, especially those I haven't explored yet. But common areas include economics, psychology, biology, philosophy and cultures, technology and sociology.
